name: Recrusis
description:
Recrusis is a turn-based battler with heavy inspiration from games like Fire emblem. this is my first solo game, and think i turned out quite well! I wasn't able to finish the third level in time, but oh well. and I am just now realizing as I'm typing this that I didn't even add any sound effects... oof.

controls: 

arrow keys to move 

Z X C for Confirm, Cancel, and Menu.
